title: Judge

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - At night, grant someone Legal Protection. Luckily this grants them powerful defense.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- After successfully protecting someone, you permanently unlock the ability to speak to the Jury at night (all dead players).
- The Jury may vote for any player using plurality. You are aware of who they voted for. If the most voted for player is hanged the next day, you can grant any player permanent basic defense (they are not informed if they get it.)

desc:
Post 4500
*"How are you, a judge, going to protect me from a gunshot?"*
